de.dviererbe.healthtrack.domain

Class StepCountRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dviererbe.healthtrack.domain.StepCountRecord

  • public class StepCountRecord
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an immutable record of steps count at a given date and time.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DefaultStepCountGoal
      The default step count goal for a day.
      int Goal
      The scalar steps count quantity goal for the day that intended.
      int StepCount
      The scalar steps count quantity that was recorded.
      java.time.LocalDateTime TimeOfMeasurement
      The date and time when the measurement was recorded.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StepCountRecord(int stepCount, int goal, java.time.LocalDateTime timeOfMeasurement)
      Creates a new immutable StepCountRecord instance for specified step count, date and time with a random identifier.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StepCountRecord

        public StepCountRecord(int stepCount,
                       int goal,
                       java.time.LocalDateTime timeOfMeasurement)
        Creates a new immutable StepCountRecord instance for specified step count, date and time with a random identifier.
        Parameters:
        stepCount - The count of steps that is recorded at the timeOfMeasurement.
        goal - what the step count goal of the day was.
        timeOfMeasurement - The date and time when the measurement was taken.
